hasMenuItem.name: Build Your Own Large 14-inch Vegan Pizza (2-Toppings)
hasMenuItem.description: Customize a large 14-inch vegan pizza: Choose from original, gluten-friendly, or stuffed crust. Select original tomato, creamy garlic, or basil pesto sauce. Pick any 2 toppings: vegetables, vegan meats, or vegan seafood.

hasMenuItem.name: Build Your Own Small 10-inch Vegan Pizza (2-Toppings)
hasMenuItem.description: 10-inch vegan pizza with two toppings of choice. Options include original, gluten-friendly, or stuffed crust. Sauces: tomato, garlic, pesto. Toppings: range from vegetables to vegan meats and seafood.

hasMenuItem.name: Build Your Own Medium 12-inch Vegan Pizza (2-Toppings)
hasMenuItem.description: Build your own 12-inch vegan pizza: choose from original, gluten-friendly, or stuffed crust. Selection of original tomato, creamy garlic, or basil pesto sauce. Over 20 toppings including a variety of vegetables and vegan meats like pepperoni and chicken, plus vegan seafood options.
